heisig_story: This kanji is based on the pictograph of a tree with some branches going upwards and others hanging down, split right down the middle. When that picture's right side is isolated, it becomes the kanji for one-sided, in the sense of only one part of a whole.

WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The one sided radical and the one sided kanji are the same!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Think of anything that is one sided. A battle. A sports game. A relationship. What makes them so one sided? One side always has a catapult (ã‹ãŸ).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine a one sided situation that you've had. Now imagine the winning side with a catapult. For example, a baseball game where one team is destroying the other. That's because instead of a pitcher, they have a catapult.

humanum_full_description_en:
" Piece " is formed by taking the right half of "æœ¨", which means that the wood is split and divided into two halves. "Shuowen": "Pian, judge the wood. From the half-wood." Paragraph note: "It is said that one is divided into two wood." There is no separate use of " Pian " in the Warring States script, and it means " wood " when used as a radical the same. For example, Zhongshan Wang Fanghu 's " strategy " is written from " bamboo " and " ğ£‚” ". " ğ£‚” " with " analysis " from the " sheet " and the " wood " meaning the same. (Participate in Yu Haoliang)

" Pian " by extension means half and partial. Such as "The Analects. "Yan Yuan": "Single words can analyze prisoners, and the reasons are related to them?" He Yan set an explanation and quoted Kong Anguo: "Pictures are still partial. Hearing a lawsuit must be two words to determine right and wrong, and only one word can break the prisoner. "Fazhen of the Tang Dynasty, "Rafting on a Moonlit Night": "The clouds in Xisai are clear, and the moon is slanting across the South Lake."

" Piece " also means single and single. "Guang Ya. "Explanation": "Pian, Zen also." Wang Niansun Shuzhen: "Zen and Shantong." Such as "Selected Works. Zuo Si "Fu of Wu Du": "Double the eyes are compared, the film is the king Yu." Liu Liang's note: "The two-walkers are the eyes, and the only one is Wang Yu. Pian, only also." Northern Song Dynasty Su Shi "Wanghu Pavilion" : "The west wind is rushing, and the mountain is lonely at dusk."

" Piece " means sporadic and partial. Such as "Selected Works. Lu Shiheng's "Xie Pingyuan Nei Shi Biao": "It doesn't matter whether a few words are in the meantime, the handwriting of events can be pushed to school, and once turned around, it is even more sinful." Bai Juyi of the Tang Dynasty "Fan Wei Fu": "Although The film art must be accepted, so it is not for the young talent."

" Pian " also means something flat and thin. Such as "Southern History. "The Biography of Emperor Zhao Wang of Qi Wuling": "(Ye) There was no chess game when I was young. It was broken into pieces, from horizontal to chess." Tang Dynasty Du Fu "Send Yang Wu Guizhou Tan": "The plum blossom is thousands of miles away, and the snow flakes are deep in winter."

" Pian " can be used as a quantifier, used for flat and thin things. For example, in the Southern Dynasties Liang Wujun's "Continuation of Qi Harmony": "A bauhinia tree in front of the hall, a total of three pieces of discussion." It is also used for scenes connected together, such as Bei Zhou Yuxin's "Mirror Poem": "Light is like a piece of water, Shadows and photos of people on both sides." It is also used for weather, sound, etc., such as the Northern Song Dynasty Lu You "The Book of Traveling to the North of Shebei Touches the Eyes": "It's a trip to the north of the Shebei three-way road, and a piece of autumn in the west of the bridge." "Qian Xiucai Wrongly Occupied the Phoenix Sun": "The praise called Le Ren to stop playing, and when I heard it, there was a sound of wind and it made a strange noise."
humanum_short_description_en: " Piece " is formed from the right half of " Wood ", which means that the wood is split and divided into two halves.
